page.title: 14MY LIFE AT HOME - EVENING
page.content: by Leah Watson. On Mondays I have to walk home on my own because Nadine stays at school for Country Dancing. When I get home my Mum and I go to the Youth Centre where my Mum helps with the Monday Club. At 5.30 I go to Majorettes. I am in the little group. We practice marching and my sister teaches me at Majorettes. Then I go on to the Red Cross cadets meeting, where I learn First Aid and how to help people who are hurt. We all work in groups. At last it is time to go home. I buy some sweets on the way and then go home to tea. After that I watch some television programmes then go to bed and fall asleep.
